#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		string str,name;
		cin>>name>>str;
		int i,po=0;
		int alpha[26]={0};
		for(i=0;i<(int)str.length();i++){
			alpha[str[i]-'a']++;
			}
		int xs=0;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++){
			xs=xs^alpha[i];
		}
		if(xs!=0)cout<<name<<endl;
		else if(name[0]=='T')cout<<"Varun\n";
		else cout<<"Tarun\n";
		}
	return 0;
	}
